name: garmin-grafana
description: Garmin-Grafana is a self-hosted pipeline that extracts Garmin health metrics and visualizes them in Grafana dashboards. It lets users monitor activity, sleep, and performance without uploading personal data to third-party clouds.
features: Garmin Data Export: Extract health and fitness metrics from Garmin devices for self-hosted analysis.
Grafana Dashboards: Visualize activity, sleep, heart rate, and performance data in customizable Grafana dashboards.
Privacy-Focused: Keep personal health data on your own infrastructure without third-party cloud services.
Activity Tracking: Monitor daily steps, distance, calories, and exercise sessions with detailed charts.
Sleep Analysis: Track sleep patterns, quality, and duration with historical trend visualization.
Performance Metrics: Analyze training load, VO2 max, recovery time, and other advanced fitness indicators.
Automated Sync: Schedule automatic data extraction from Garmin Connect for continuous monitoring.
Historical Trends: View long-term health and fitness trends with flexible time-range analysis.
